title: Next steps
description: You are now familiar with how to create a stack navigator, configure it on your screen components, navigate between routes, and display full-screen modals. Stack navigator and its related APIs will be the most frequently used tools in your React Navigation toolbelt, but there are problems that they don't solve. For example, you can't build tab-based navigation using a stack navigator — for that, you need to use a [TabNavigator](tab-based-navigation.html).
